## Facade.devtool property

Configure sourcemaps

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
devtool: devtool;
```

## Remarks

Compatible with any of \[Webpack's devtool options\](https://webpack.js.org/configuration/devtool/).

## Example


```js
app.devtool('inline-cheap-module-source-map')
```
